name: KidneyTansplant
title: Kidney tansplant
description:
This is adapted from the American College of Emergency Physicians/AMA-PCPI "Kidney Transplant"
https://vsac.nlm.nih.gov/valueset/2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1106.35/expansion/Latest
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Represent codes indicating a patient has had a kidney transplant.),(Data Element Scope: ICD-10-PCS codes that may be in FHIR resources associated with Past Surgical History (Procedure resource)),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes that indicate a kidney transplant specifically),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes that indicate a transplant but not specifically a kidney transplant)
